Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2 Complete: HASH Price Display from Figure Markets

- Updated src/app/core.cljs to fetch HASH price from Figure Markets API
- Implemented atom-based state management with three states: loading, success, error
- Added native JavaScript fetch API integration (no external libraries)
- Created responsive UI showing HASH price with large, clear format
- Added error handling with user-friendly messages
- Created test-hash-price.js Playwright test
- All tests passing: HASH price $0.0300 displays correctly
- Updated index.html version to 0.2.0

API Integration:
- Endpoint: https://www.figuremarkets.com/service-hft-exchange/api/v1/markets
- Extracts HASH-USD midMarketPrice from response
- Displays with 4 decimal precision

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Switch to cljs-ajax for idiomatic Clojure HTTP requests

- Added scittle.cljs-ajax.js and scittle.promesa.js CDN plugins to index.html
- Replaced native js/fetch with ajax.core/GET for more idiomatic Clojure
- Updated src/app/core.cljs to use :handler/:error-handler pattern
- Automatic JSON parsing with :keywords? true
- Better error handling with cljs-ajax error structure
- All Playwright tests passing with new implementation
- Created context.md to preserve critical project knowledge
- Updated plan.md and CLAUDE.md documentation
- Version bumped to 0.3.0

Rationale:
User requirement for future fetching work - use Clojure idioms where possible.
Reference project loads cljs-ajax but doesn''t use it (uses native fetch).
We''re being consistent: load cljs-ajax plugins and actually use them.
